email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Star, available for the laycan period of October 15-20. The vessel has a DWT of 150,000 and an LOA of 280 meters. The starting freight rate we’re quoting is in the low 50s, specifically $50.75 per metric ton. Let me know if this works for you or if you’d like to discuss further. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit higher than we were hoping for. Would you be able to come down to the mid-40s, say $48.50 per metric ton? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate? Looking forward to your reply. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I understand your position, but $48.50 is a bit tight given current market conditions. However, I can offer a revised rate of $49.75 per metric ton. The demurrage rate is $20,000 per day, pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the revised offer. We can agree to $49.75 per metric ton, provided the laycan remains October 15-20. Please confirm the demurrage rate is $20,000 per day, pro rata, and send over the charter party for review. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear that. Yes, the laycan remains October 15-20, and the demurrage rate is confirmed at $20,000 per day, pro rata. I’ll have the charter party drafted and sent to you by end of day today. Thanks for your cooperation, and looking forward to finalizing this deal. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the prompt follow-up. I’ve reviewed the charter party, and everything looks in order. We’ll proceed with the agreed terms. Please confirm the vessel’s readiness and any additional details for loading. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, excellent news. The MV Ocean Star is confirmed and ready for loading as per the agreed schedule. I’ll keep you updated on any developments. Thanks again for your business, and feel free to reach out if you need anything else. Best regards, Sarah
